topics.body:
You know what the grand fucking irony of all the wars in history and all the deaths in history is?

How to achieve peace through economics has been known about for thousands of years historically.

What I mean by this is that a very ancient greece country(I forget it's name) back then was the economic powerhouse of the mediterranean and never went to war.  How could a could never go to war?  Simple economics; they made the other countries economically dependent on them.

It's simple really, want to prevent other countries from declaring war on you?  Make them economically dependent on you through trade, but to where you don't need them so if they start shit then just pull the carpet out from under them and watch as their country burns down economically.  If everyone in the world and the world's economy depends on you then no one will dare start anything with you.

Take russia for example; they want ukraine bad, but you know why they haven't taken it by force?  Cause they have a stock market and they can not survive economically if their trade partners sanction them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"California lesbian couple 'starved their three children so badly they looked like concentration camp victims and kept one adopted daughter chained to the floor'.[157][158] Why are California lesbians permitted to adopt children? See: Homosexual Couples and Domestic Violence 

One of the lesbians who starved the children was overweight. See: Lesbianism and obesity"

You hit the nail on the head.
